item.title: New Release. Mizuame V1.3.0
item.description:
New Release

We released Mizuame v1.3.0!

And we released the Mizuame on the AppStore.

New Features

  • Mizuame supports some Markdown syntax and Markdown view.
    • However you cannot print the Markdown view itself.
    • For more information about the supported Markdown syntax, see also…Features
  • A menu bar automatically hide.

By default, these features are disabled. If you want to use them, please enable them in the General tab of the settings.

item.title: New Release. Mizuame v1.2.3
item.description:
New Release

We released Mizuame v1.2.3!

And we released the Mizuame on the AppStore.

New Features

  • Nothing.

Improvement

  • Increase the padding around the edges of the note.

Bugfix

  • Fixed the Mizuame doesn’t sync “Login Items” on Mac.
  • Fixed the note preview in Settings.
  • Fixed the Settings background color.

Others

  • Nothing.

item.title: New Release. Mizuame V1.2.2
item.description:
New Release

We released Mizuame v1.2.2!

And we released the Mizuame on the AppStore.
You can find it by Search for “Mizuame”.

New Features

  • You can resize the note by dragging its edges.

Improvement

  • Change the window size for each settings tab.

Bugfix

  • fixed a bug that the settings from being displayed in the foreground.

Others

  • Nothing.

item.title: New Release. Mizuame V1.2.1
item.description:
New Release

We released Mizuame v1.2.1!

And we released the Mizuame on the AppStore.
You can find it by Search for “Mizuame”.

New Features

  • The calculation result will be rounded to 3 digits after the decimal point. (e.g. 1.23456… -> 1.235) You can specify the number of digits after the decimal point.

For more details, see also Features.

Improvement

  • Added “Add to Login Items”.
  • Refactering.

Bugfix

  • Nothing.

Others

  • Nothing.

item.title: New Release. Mizuame V1.2.0
item.description:
New Release

We released Mizuame v1.2.0!

And we released the Mizuame on the AppStore.
You can find it by Search for “Mizuame”.

New Features

  • Formulas written in the note are now automatically calculated.
  • You can choose a text color from the theme, black, dark gray, or gray.

Initially, These features is disable. If you want to use them, you need to enable in the general tab of the settings.

For more details, see also Features.

item.title: New Release. Mizuame V1.1.3
item.description:
New Release

We released Mizuame v1.1.3!

And we released the Mizuame on the AppStore.
You can find it by Search for “Mizuame”.

Improvement

  • Improved redo(command + z) and undo(command + y) functionality.

Bugfix

  • Fixed a bug that cannot changeg note size.
  • Open a “Settings” with the keyboard shortcut " command + , “.

Others

  • Nothing

item.title: New Release. Mizuame V1.1.1
item.description:
New Release

We released Mizuame v1.1.1!

And we released the Mizuame on the AppStore.
You can find it by Search for “Mizuame”.

Improvement

  • Compatible with macOS 14 (Sonoma)

Bugfix

  • Nothing

Others

  • Removed “Settings” from the context menu that opens when you right-click an icon in the menu bar. We decided that “Settings” was not necessary because you can also open “Settings” from the note.

item.title: Mizuame v1.1.0
item.description:
New Release

We released Mizuame v1.1.0!

And we released the Mizuame on the AppStore.
You can find it by Search for “Mizuame”.

Improvement

  • Implemented a new feature called “Pin” that allows you to keep notes open.
  • Added “Reset settings button” to General tab in Settings.

Bugfix

  • Nothing

Others

  • Refactored the source code.

item.title: Mizuame v1.0.2
item.description:
New Release

We released Mizuame v1.0.2!

And we released the Mizuame on the AppStore.
You can find it by Search for “Mizuame”.

Improvement

  • Changed a message whne auto saving.
  • Changed a layout of print tab of settings.

Bugfix

  • Fixed a app icon background.
  • Added a description about printing to a help tab of the settings.

item.title: Mizuame v0.1.0
item.description:
New Release

We released Mizuame v0.1.0!

  • The note on menu bar.
  • Auto save.
  • Some note theme.
  • Change note size.
  • Change font size.
  • And more.

item.title: Documentation
item.description:
• Quick start
  • Basic usage
  • Hint
  • Troubleshooting

Quick start

Install

There are two way to install Mizuame on your Mac.

  • AppStore(Recommend)
    1. Click here or Search for “Mizuame” in AppStore.
    2. Download and install from AppStore.
  • Build from project
    1. git clone https://github.com/3colorr/Mizuame.git
    2. Build by Xcode.

Basic usage

Write note

  1. Launch the Mizuame.
    • After launch, Mizuame’s icon displayed on menu bar.
  2. You can open the note with clicking Mizuame’s icon on menu bar.
  3. You can typing, copy and paste.
    • A content is automatically saved.
  4. You can close the note with clicking outside the note.
    • If you quit the Mizuame, you should click power icon on the Mizuame’s menu.
    • See also Settings.

Menu

  • Power icon
    • You can quit the Mizuame.
    • Also, you can quit it from context menu.
  • Pin icon
    • You can keep the notes open.
  • Eraser icon
    • You cna delete all contents on note.
  • Gear icon
    • You can customize Mizuame settings.
    • See also Settings.

Settings

There are a following tabs.

item.title: Features
item.description:
Outlines

  • Basic
    • The Note
    • Pin
    • Making Text Black
  • Design
    • Themes
    • Light/Dark mode
  • Note Actions
    • Calculation
    • Markdown
  • Othres

Basic

theNote

The notes that you type will be saved on your PC. Therefore, you cannot share the notes on your the other PC. Because this app is not a high performance note app.

Pin

You can fix the note with the pin.
With this setting, The notes will always be displayed on top of the other windows.
